title: How to Draw Jack Frost

steps.headline: Near the topmost center of the paper, draw a medium circle for the head.
Attach a spade-like shape below the circle for his chin and jaw.
Draw vertical and horizontal guide lines for the face.
Draw stick guide lines for the neck and torso.
Draw circles and tubes for joints and arms.
For his staff, trace a stick pattern with a large circle on the edge (pointed towards you)
Using guide lines for the face, draw his eyes, nose and lips.
Draw his hair and fringes.
Make his hair appear blown away by a wind.
Trace his body, arms and clothes (a hoodie).
Trace the outlines of his staff.
Add details to his staff.
Erase unnecessary lines.
Color the drawing as desired.
Near the top and center of the paper, draw a small circle for the head.
Add a tip-of-a-spade like shape below this circle for his chin and jaw.
steps.description: Draw a vertical line across the circle down to this chin-jaw shape. Draw two parallel horizontal line about mid-center of the head and intersecting the vertical line. These lines will be the guide for placing the eyes and face details later.

steps.headline: Near and below the head, draw a quadrilateral polygon as his body.
steps.description: Beneath it, attach a pentagon to serve as his hips. Attach this body to his head by a pair of curved lines.

steps.headline: Draw tube shapes for his limbs.
Using guide lines for the face, draw his eyes, nose, ears and lips.
Draw his hair and fringes.
Trace his body, arms and his clothes' details.
Trace his hands and add his staff.
steps.description: Draw his feet and its details.

steps.headline: Erase unnecessary lines.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors
text: Jack Frost (Close up) Near the topmost center of the paper, draw a medium circle for the head.  Attach a spade-like shape below the circle for his chin and jaw.  Draw vertical and horizontal guide lines for the face.  Draw stick guide lines for the neck and torso.  Draw circles and tubes for joints and arms.  For his staff, trace a stick pattern with a large circle on the edge (pointed towards you)  Using guide lines for the face, draw his eyes, nose and lips.  Draw his hair and fringes.  Make his hair appear blown away by a wind.  Trace his body, arms and clothes (a hoodie). Define details. Trace the outlines of his staff.  Add details to his staff.  Erase unnecessary lines.  Color the drawing as desired.  Jack Frost (Full body) Near the top and center of the paper, draw a small circle for the head.  Add a tip-of-a-spade like shape below this circle for his chin and jaw. Draw a vertical line across the circle down to this chin-jaw shape. Draw two parallel horizontal line about mid-center of the head and intersecting the vertical line. These lines will be the guide for placing the eyes and face details later. Near and below the head, draw a quadrilateral polygon as his body. Beneath it, attach a pentagon to serve as his hips. Attach this body to his head by a pair of curved lines. Draw tube shapes for his limbs.  Using guide lines for the face, draw his eyes, nose, ears and lips.  Draw his hair and fringes.  Trace his body, arms and his clothes' details.  Trace his hands and add his staff. Draw his feet and its details. Erase unnecessary lines. Color the drawing as desired.

Attach this body to his head by a pair of curved lines.
